snippet.title: Dragon Ball Origins 2 - NDS - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
It's time to hit the road with Goku's latest adventure in the Dragon Ball saga ! Dragon Ball: Origins 2 is available now exclusively for Nintendo DS™. Fight your way from Goku's first meeting with the Red Ribbon Army to the resurrection of Upa's father, with no shortage of colourful encounters and Ki energy-charged clashes along the way !

Join the Dragon Ball Community on the game's official:
- Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/dbz.videogames
- Website: http://www.dragonball-videogames.com

Check out your local Namco Bandai website for more information on our other titles: http://www.namcobandaigames.eu/
